articles.title: Cormac McCarthy, celebrated US novelist, dies aged 89 - The Guardian
articles.description: Author of Blood Meridian, The Road and No Country for Old Men died in his home of natural causes, publisher announces
articles.content:
Cormac McCarthy has died at the age of 89, the American authors publisher has announced.
McCarthy died in his home of natural causes. His son John McCarthy confirmed the death.

articles.title: Harrison Ford, 80, insists he 'never wanted to be rich and famous' - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'No one ever believes this, but I never wanted to be rich and famous,' he told People this week. 'I just wanted to be an actor.' He keeps making massive films that have made him rich.
articles.content:
Harrison Ford - who is reportedly worth more than $300million - never left carpentry and got into acting for the money.
